document_data.mainbody:
arlraw was a strong, alcoholic dwarven beverage available in Khôltar, south Faerûn, particularly the dwarf-owned tavern known as Phlambrors. Few non-dwarves could tolerate this rich, potent drink.
Garlraw was made by mixing different varieties of ale, whiskey, and sweet syrup together, adding butter, and simmering over low heat to thicken it and enhance the flavor.
